page.title: 13Industry and Trade
page.content: Near Adversane is an 8-acre industrial site used by Vehicle and Car Breakers. This is well screened from the road and neighbours by coppices and banked grassland, and a long winding approach road so discreetly signposted that few people know of the firm's existence. Car bodies from 50 years ago lie buried deep under trees and bushes. Not far away on the Billingshurst road lie two large agricultural buildings used for wholesaling pesticides. This land is on clay; the remainder of the 7-acre site is on Greensand, and is used as a nursery, with glasshouses. A small agricultural manufacturing concern off the Coolham road processes crops such as oilseed rape, peas and all beans to make animal feeds (mostly pellets and nuts) for farm livestock. They first used beans in 1985. Near Coneyhurst is a boarding kennels.
